hitagifs.fs — Virtual file system¶

class hitagifs.fs.HitagiFS(root=None)¶

HitagiFS virtual file system. All paths are handled internally as normalized absolute paths. All external paths are sanitized with os.path.abspath() prior to being stored internally or returned.

__init__(root=None)¶

If root is None, HitagiFS will get root from the environment variable HITAGIFS_ROOT. If it’s not set, it will raise FSError. Otherwise, root will be used. Either way, the path will be normalized with os.path.abspath().

data_dir = '/home/darkfeline/lib/python/hitagiFS/virt-env/lib/python3.3/site-packages/hitagifs/data'¶
find(tags)¶

Return a list of files with all of the given tags.

tags is a list. tags is left unchanged. Returns a list.

classmethod init(root)¶
rename(source, dest, tag=None)¶

Rename tracked file.

Rename all tracked hard links of source to dest. If file is not tagged, nothing happens. If tag is given, only that singular instance of file is renamed. If any name collisions exist, nothing will be renamed and FSError will be raised.

rm(file)¶

Removes all tags from file.

file is a path relative to the current dir. If file is not tagged, nothing happens.

Warning

Currently has no safety measure if unlinking one of the hard links fails. If that happens, state will be left halfway.

Warning

In essence, this removes all tracked hard links to file! If no other hard links exist, file is deleted.

root_dir = '.hitagifs'¶
tag(file, tag)¶

Tag file with tag.

file is relative to current dir. tag is relative to FS root. If file is already tagged, TagError is raised.

untag(file, tag)¶

Remove tag from file.

file is relative to current dir. tag is relative to FS root. If file is not tagged, TagError is raised.

exception hitagifs.fs.FSError¶

File system error

Tag error
